TEXT.TITLE: CACEX DENIES BRAZIL FCOJ PRICE RISE RUMOURS
TEXT.BODY: There has been no rise in the price of Frozen Concentrated Orange Juice, FCOJ, a spokesman for the Banco do Brasil's Foreign Trade Department, Cacex, said. He was responding to rumours in the international market that Brazil had raised its FCOJ prices in range of 1,075 to 1,150 dlrs per tonne. Reuter
